ComicInfo.Penciller: Eric Shanower,Jordan Raskin,Maya Sakamoto,Tom McWeeney,Rich Heddon,Eddie Campbell,P. Craig Russell,Rich Heddon,Tom McWeeney,Eric Shanower,Maya Sakamoto,Jordan Raskin,Eddie Campbell,P. Craig Russell
ComicInfo.Summary: Beginning in this double-sized issue: Part 1 of a three-part lead-in to the upcoming miniseries, Predator: Race War. Story by novelist Andrew Vachss (Hard Looks), adapted by Randy Stradley (Aliens vs. Predator) and artists Jordan Raskin and John Beatty (Punisher). Also in this issue: the tragic conclusion to "An Accidental Death," by Ed Brubaker and Eric Shanower; "The Selfish Giant" (based on the Oscar Wilde short story) by P. Craig Russell; "Money For Nothing," by Jo Duffy and Maya Sakamoto; and, from Rich Hedden and Tom McWeeney's Roachmill, the wacky, behind-the-scenes-at-Dark-Horse expos√©: "Zoo-Lou vs. Editor"! Cover by Ray Lago (Hellraiser).
ComicInfo.Title: Zoo-Lou v.s. Editor; Money for Nothing; Race War Part One; A Pub Far Away; The Selfish Giant
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Vachss,Ed Brubaker,Eddie Campbell,Jo Duffy,P. Craig Russell,Randy Stradley,Rich Hedden,Rich Heddon,Tom McWeeney,Oscar Wilde,Rich Heddon,Tom McWeeney,Ed Brubaker,Jo Duffy,Andrew Vachss,Randy Stradley,Eddie Campbell,Oscar Wilde,P. Craig Russell
